name: V-0.9
body:
The game is almost finished, we'll keep that updated by adding new ICMons and features but, we are one the finished line for what we promised to you.
You can test the game by downloading the version you want, uncompress it and run the run.bat or run.sh depending on your version.
If you have any issue with the game, please let us know by the Issue button on git or you can create a [new issue.](https://github.com/Lounol72/ICPocket/issues)
@AstroZr @Natp24109 @lOkaal1

name: V-0.5
body:
In wait of the full DB this is the release of the new map & new moves & saves.
This is meant for tests, if you have any issues with the game pls notify us by creating a [new issue](https://github.com/Lounol72/ICPocket/issues)

name: V-0.1.1 Patch
